de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller

Class BratAjaxCasController

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.tudarmstadt.ukp.clarin.webanno.brat.controller.BratAjaxCasController

  • public class BratAjaxCasController
extends Object
    an Ajax Controller for the BRAT Front End. Most of the actions such as getCollectionInformation , getDocument, createArc, CreateSpan, deleteSpan, DeleteArc,... are implemented. Besides returning the JSON response to the brat FrontEnd, This controller also manipulates creation of annotation Documents
    Author:
    Seid Muhie Yimam, Richard Eckart de Castilho

      • storeSVG

        public StoreSvgResponse storeSVG()

                     org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas aJcas,
                     Integer aId)
        Delete a span annotation from the CAS
        Parameters:
        aType - The span annotation
        aJcas - The JCAS from which annotation will deleted
        aId - the CAS address of the annotation

      • getJCas

        public org.apache.uima.jcas.JCas getJCas(SourceDocument aDocument,
                                Project aProject,
                                User aUser)
                                  throws org.apache.uima.UIMAException,
                                         IOException,
                                         ClassNotFoundException
        Get the CAS object for the document in the project created by the the User. If this is the first time the user is accessing the annotation document, it will be read from the source document, and converted to CAS
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException
        org.apache.uima.UIMAException
        IOException
